title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: When performing the 'copy package' operation in org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3, selecting xxx as the destination results in an unexpected behavior.
OB: When the 'copy package' operation is performed and xxx is selected as the destination, the resulting package 'xx' contains a sub-package called 'ui'.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui in jdt.ui3.
2. Perform the 'copy package' operation.
3. Select xxx as the destination.
